pullRequest.title: [docs] Re-org topics in Admin API section
pullRequest.bodyText:
Motivation
The sub-commands for persistent is changed into "topics". And persistent topics can be partitioned and non-partitioned topics.
Modifications

Refactor the topic structure, will keep only one md file for the topic in the "Admin API" section.
Refine the commands used in the topic section from "persistent" into "topics" for both pulsar-admin, REST API and Java.
Adopt switch tab for pulsar-admin, REST API and Java methods.

Follow-ups

Refine the partitioned and non-partitioned sections.
Remove the other 3 files and check whether there is any link to the 3 deleted files throughout.
Check the md ID refinement.
Fix the REST API links in #8377

@@ -117,137 +112,132 @@ $ pulsar-admin persistent revoke-permission \
